stars.name: Spica
stars.info: Spica is the brightest star in the Virgo constellation and one of the brightest stars in the night sky. It is a binary system of a giant and a subgiant.

stars.name: Porrima
stars.info: Porrima is a binary star system in the constellation of Virgo. It is also known as Gamma Virginis.

stars.name: Vindemiatrix
stars.info: Vindemiatrix is a giant star in the Virgo constellation. It is also known as Epsilon Virginis.

stars.name: Zavijava
stars.info: Zavijava, also known as Beta Virginis, is a main-sequence star located in the Virgo constellation.

stars.name: Heze
stars.info: Heze, also known as Zeta Virginis, is a main-sequence star in Virgo.

stars.name: Auva
stars.info: Auva, or Delta Virginis, is a red giant star in the Virgo constellation.

stars.name: Sadalmelik
stars.info: Sadalmelik is one of the brightest stars in the constellation of Aquarius, known as Alpha Aquarii.

stars.name: Sadalsuud
stars.info: Sadalsuud is a bright giant star in Aquarius. It is also known as Beta Aquarii and is slightly brighter than Sadalmelik.

stars.name: Skat
stars.info: Skat is a relatively bright star in Aquarius, also known as Delta Aquarii.

stars.name: Tarf
stars.info: Tarf, also known as Beta Cancri, is the brightest star in the constellation of Cancer.

stars.name: Asellus Borealis
stars.info: Asellus Borealis is a relatively faint star in Cancer, also known as Gamma Cancri.

stars.name: Acubens
stars.info: Acubens is a white star in the Cancer constellation, also known as Alpha Cancri.

stars.name: Castor
stars.info: Castor is one of the brightest stars in the constellation of Gemini and is actually a complex multiple star system.

stars.name: Pollux
stars.info: Pollux is an orange giant star and the brightest star in Gemini, also known as Beta Geminorum.

stars.name: Wasat
stars.info: Wasat is a star in Gemini, also known as Delta Geminorum. It has a faint companion star.

stars.name: Zubenelgenubi
stars.info: Zubenelgenubi is a binary star system and one of the brightest stars in the constellation of Libra.

stars.name: Zubeneschamali
stars.info: Zubeneschamali is the brightest star in Libra, known for its greenish tint.

stars.name: Brachium
stars.info: Brachium is a red giant star in Libra, also known as Sigma Librae.

stars.name: Hamal
stars.info: Hamal is the brightest star in Aries and is a giant star that has moved off the main sequence.

stars.name: Sheratan
stars.info: Sheratan is a binary star system in Aries, also known as Beta Arietis.

stars.name: Mesarthim
stars.info: Mesarthim is a binary star in Aries, also known as Gamma Arietis.

stars.name: Antares
stars.info: Antares is the brightest star in the Scorpio constellation and a red supergiant. It is sometimes called the heart of the scorpion.

stars.name: Shaula
stars.info: Shaula is the second brightest star in Scorpio and is a multiple star system.

stars.name: Sargas
stars.info: Sargas is a bright giant star in Scorpio, also known as Theta Scorpii.

stars.name: Regulus
stars.info: Regulus is the brightest star in the constellation of Leo and a part of a multiple star system.

stars.name: Denebola
stars.info: Denebola is the second brightest star in Leo, known for its white color.

stars.name: Zosma
stars.info: Zosma is a bright star in the Leo constellation, also known as Delta Leonis.

stars.name: Kaus Australis
stars.info: Kaus Australis is the brightest star in Sagittarius and is a binary system.

stars.name: Nunki
stars.info: Nunki is a hot blue star in the Sagittarius constellation, also known as Sigma Sagittarii.

stars.name: Ascella
stars.info: Ascella is a bright star in Sagittarius, also known as Zeta Sagittarii.

stars.name: Deneb Algedi
stars.info: Deneb Algedi is the brightest star in Capricornus and is a multiple star system.

stars.name: Dabih
stars.info: Dabih is a bright giant star in Capricornus, also known as Beta Capricorni.

stars.name: Nashira
stars.info: Nashira is a bright star in Capricornus, also known as Gamma Capricorni.

stars.name: Alrescha
stars.info: Alrescha is the brightest star in Pisces and is a binary star system.

stars.name: Fumalsamakah
stars.info: Fumalsamakah is a bright star in Pisces, also known as Beta Piscium.

stars.name: Torcular
stars.info: Torcular is a star in Pisces, also known as Omicron Piscium.

stars.name: Aldebaran
stars.info: Aldebaran is the brightest star in the Taurus constellation and represents the eye of the bull.

stars.name: Elnath
stars.info: Elnath is the second brightest star in Taurus and lies on the boundary with the constellation of Auriga.

stars.name: Theta Tauri
stars.info: Theta Tauri is a binary star system in Taurus, part of the Hyades star cluster.
